Entries.default: Soul energy swirls about you, pressing heavily against your esoteric senses. With a slight exertion of will, you can direct the ambient essence...
[Return the soul essence to the Crucible and the wildlife of Kazuwari.]
[Channel the soul essence into Muātu, empowering him.]
[Send the soul essence to the Wheel.]
You allow the energies to settle again into the arena, even as you feel some of the power escaping into the wilderness beyond.
As you pour the power into Muātu, your ghostly guide shimmers brightly. He looks at his hands as if seeing them for the first time, and you feel a profound sense of gratitude from him.
You drain the ambient essence from the air, settling it into your own body. Warmth spreads to the ends of your limbs as the soul energy pulses through you.
You attempt to return the souls to the Wheel but find your efforts stymied. It seems that something blocks the way to the Beyond.
You channel your wrath towards the souls, crushing them in the vice of your will until nothing remains.
